Text:
Thanks for the ul!  Used to dig reading Richard Corben stuff (who doesn't love his despiction of scantly clad women?!)

You seem to be doing alot of underground stuff, might there be any chance of the Sacred and the Profane gn from Eclipse Comics?
You're very welcome, binderguy1. And yeah, I think I'll be able to get to Sacred and the Profane eventually.
Wow! Richard Corben & Basil Wolverton both in one day. Thanks.
